trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Hollister
There were no other sightings in Hollister on or around May 13th 2010
divs: Sighting DetailsMy fiancee and I were in the back yard of my moms house and we were staring at the stars when I thought I saw a shooting star but it came closer then I thought it was a bird then it flew right over us and both of us were tripping out trying to figure out what it was. It didnt make a sound, it was like a white V flying backwards. You know how you see birds flying, it was oposite of that. There was no engine sound or anything and it looked like a white boomerang but alot bigger, the size of mabey a sesna plane. As far as I know, nobody has a plane that doesnt make a sound and flies backwards and if the government is building these wierd things they should tell the citizens so we dont freak out thinking its not from this world..we didnt see it again we ran in and told my mom whom we were visiting, she lives in Cali, we live in Texas, that we saw a UFO but she seemed extremely uninterested of course I dont blame her.
